courseSection0.text:
Minor Admission Requirements
Not open to Computer Engineering, Computer Science or Information Technology majors.
Minor Requirements
None
Prerequisite Courses
None

courseSection0.text0:
Complete the following: 
COP3223C - Introduction to Programming with C (3)
COP3330 - Object Oriented Programming (3)
COP3502C - Computer Science I (3)
COP3503C - Computer Science II (3)
CDA3103C - Computer Logic and Organization (3)
courseSection0.text1:
Complete at least 1 of the following: 
COT3100C - Introduction to Discrete Structures (3)
MAD2104 - Foundations of Discrete Math (3)

li.Not open to Computer Engineering, Comput: Not open to Computer Engineering, Computer Science or Information Technology majors.
li.A grade of \"C\" (2.0) or better is requ: A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in each course used to satisfy the minor.
li.At least 9 hours used in the minor must: At least 9 hours used in the minor must be earned within Computer Science at UCF.
li.No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit): No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
li.Internship, cooperative education, or In: Internship, cooperative education, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.

courseSection3.text:
Other Requirements

Not open to Computer Engineering, Computer Science or Information Technology majors.
A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in each course used to satisfy the minor.
At least 9 hours used in the minor must be earned within Computer Science at UCF.
No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
Internship, cooperative education, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
